content.body: Apparently CLDR is not stable enough for the web: https://github.com/web-platform-tests/wpt/pull/41760. This needs some attention from Intl folks I think. littledan can you help me out finding the relevant people?
content.formatted_body: Apparently CLDR is not stable enough for the web: https://github.com/web-platform-tests/wpt/pull/41760. This needs some attention from Intl folks I think. littledan can you help me out finding the relevant people?

content.body:
> <@annevk:matrix.org> Apparently CLDR is not stable enough for the web: https://github.com/web-platform-tests/wpt/pull/41760. This needs some attention from Intl folks I think. littledan can you help me out finding the relevant people?

Yeah this is sort of a long known, and to some extent it even provides back pressure on cldr to not change too much (which is extremely unfortunate)
